Reviews.Title: An excellent smartphone for the price...
Reviews.Author: L. C. Tomas "baka gaijin"
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the money. Hard to beat. Better Processor and screen resolution than L5. Offers many of the amenities some of the pricier Samsung or HTC models are offering, although it could be said this handheld is looking to steal away customer from the Sony Xperia crowd. I love the 4 inch screen!! It's a huge improvement from past Optimus models L1, L3 and L5 and it's storage (2Gb) should be enough for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Dual Sim is Very Easy
Reviews.Author: Ron G.
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up easy to use!  Dual Sim tap and go!  A little slower than I am up use to but maybe because I am in Mexico full time switching between Telcel and T Mobile

Reviews.Title: BAD :o(
Reviews.Author: Augusto Soncini
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I was told it would work with T-Mobile... BUT ONLY IN EDGE! No 3G signal is get, so is senseless. I'd like to have the version that works for USA bands, or at least my money back

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: The phone is thin and light, has a beautiful screen. Advantageous because it is dual sim and has a good processor. It has no secondary camera. I would like more battery performance, however, would recommend.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: FRANCISCO ENRIQUE LOPEZ  MALAVE
Reviews.Content: It is a good product I recommend I hope will please everyone as it was for me to receive a cordial greeting
